summaryOfNewsArticle: The City Health Department has issued a public health advisory regarding a recent outbreak of respiratory illness, first reported on April 10, 2024. The advisory, issued on April 5, 2024, outlines measures to prevent further spread, including mask-wearing, hand hygiene, and social distancing. As of April 15, 2024, the department is monitoring the situation closely, with cases rising in urban centers. Dr. Elena Martinez, a senior advisor, emphasized the importance of community cooperation and early detection. The response measures have been in place since April 5, and the situation is currently under active surveillance until April 20, 2024.
title: City Health Department Issues Public Health Advisory on Respiratory Illness Outbreak
